plot: Joe Deacon went to sea, aged only 14 in 1942. Now nearly 80, he vividly looks back at his wartime experiences.
title: The Good and the Bad: Memories of a Merchant Seaman
plot_es: Joe Deacon went to sea, aged only 14 in 1942. Now nearly 80, he vividly looks back at his wartime experiences.
original_name: The Good and the Bad: Memories of a Merchant Seaman
plot_en: Joe Deacon went to sea, aged only 14 in 1942. Now nearly 80, he vividly looks back at his wartime experiences.
